title: Study on flame retardancy of EPDM reinforced by ammonium polyphosphate
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,8684-8694
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00733F, Paper

Yifei Chen, Shengping Yi, Xilong Zhang, Dunfa Shi, Chao Liu, Puwen Rao, Chi Huang
Currently, the most widely used material for solid rocket motor (SRM) insulation is ethylene propylene diene monomer (EPDM) filled with flame-retardant and ablation-resistant fillers.
